venue.name: Microsoft New England Research & Development Center (NERD)

item.description:
June is Innovation Month in Boston!

Our June BizSpark Meetup will be held on Thursday, June 3rd at Microsoft Research Center located at One Memorial Drive in Cambridge. The security officer will direct attendees to the correct floor. There is parking available in the building. Parking is free on the street in front of the building at 6 PM.

At 6:30 PM Matt Johnson of OmniStrat will pitch his startup to Graham Brooks, Principal at .406 Ventures. I've met with Matt a number of times. I've heard about his idea and believe that anyone who can appreciate strategic planning and execution according to such plan will love his software. Plus he has a wicked cool logo! Graham Brooks joined .406 in 2007 and is involved in all aspects of the investing and portfolio management process and also leads the university outreach initiatives. He brings nine years of technology-oriented operating, investing and start-up experience. He is actively involved with RatePoint, WoodPellets.com, and DigitalSmiths.

Then we will be launching the RetreadMe.com charitable project that will give our members first hand startup experience in conception of a startup idea to execution, launch, and eventual success. You can read more about the project at http://retreadme.com... and also under our RetreadMe Message Board on Meetup.com

After the presentation | demonstration, we will go around the room introducing ourselves and asking the group for advice | opinions on any startup-related issues members are facing.

Microsoft will provide pizza. What a generous organization!

Please RSVP and bring guests.

-Marsh Sutherland
item.name: June Boston BizSpark Meetup: OmniStrat pitch to VC | RetreadMe Project Launch
